title: PandaElon
author: PandaElon
content: INTRODUCTION:In early 2021, the meme coin concept was set in stone with pioneers like Doge and Shiba, proving their potential astronomical gains if you just invest early.This paved the way for other contenders like Safemoon or Baby Doge, creating a “meme coin rush” on the Binance Smart chain that brought the eyes of millions of new investors into the market, all trying to find the next moonshot.Unfortunately, the grand majority of today’s BSC investors have missed those opportunities and are desperately trying to find the next big thing without any success, but the ones to blame are not them, it’s the market.99.99% of coins are all doing the same things: using recycled memes, outdated marketing strategies, but worst of all, have no common goal within their community to unite them.Panda Elon is the next $1 Billion Market Cap coin and your second chance.WHY PANDA ELON?Panda Elon was created to give investors who missed out on the golden days of Binance Smart Chain and give them another opportunity to change their lives.No matter how different meme coins can be, we have studied the most successful ones to exist and found the two most common traits in all of them that we will make sure to apply.The viral potential of a meme coin and a strong community.WHY WE'RE GOING VIRAL:Panda Elon combines the most famous meme in China with the most influential personality in Crypto.The Panda is undoubtedly the most used meme in Asia, its notoriety added to its meme-ability and funny content will make it stand out among the countless copycats.Elon Musk is by far the most powerful face in Crypto followed by a cult-like fan base who watches his every move.The popularity of those two huge cultural elements will create never ending word of mouth and free exposure everywhere by spreading the funny content of this unique new born meme. This matched with extensive marketing, building networks among communities, Panda Elon will be on everyone’s minds and become the #1 community in BSC.WHY WE ARE DIFFERENT, OUR COMMUNITY:The most important, yet neglected aspect of any successful coin is a strong community willing to move mountains towards one common goal.We have paired two of the biggest meme forces into one community with a united vision: being the first Panda to go to $1 Billion Market Cap.With our unique meme and rapid growth, people will care about our community and jump at the chance of being involved in making BSC history.We are focused on giving back to our community and rewarding them for their efforts to get Panda Elon viral: Giveaways, Shill army, Competitions and the love for our meme coin fuels the fire which powers this journey. IT'S NOW, OR NEVER!You have missed the golden days of BSC and are still looking for your moonshot but it’s likely to never happen, there are millions of meme coins out there.With the virality, community and just outright funny meme that Panda Elon brings to the table, how can we not take over the Binance Smart chain?We’re making history, with or without you, don’t miss it.Links:Presale: https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x1Cfc251457A4f07d21f605EAAb0c883110b9AB2d?chain=BSCWebsite: https://www.pandaelon.com/Telegram: https://t.me/PandaElonTwitter: https://twitter.com/PandaElonTikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pandaelonReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Pandaelon/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PandaelonInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/panda_elon/
